item.title: Building and hacking minikube
item.description: This document will outline the internals on minikube. It will outline how minikube works and what are the steps involved in running it inside an IDE. Having the ability to run inside the IDE will give the power of more better understanding by stepping through the code. Minikube makes heavy use of VM and out of the box it supports VMs such as VirtualBox, Hyperkit, etc. We going to go through the VirtualBox setup in Linux environment for this article.
